possible_violations.violation_name: Potential threat to right to life
possible_violations.legal_basis: Fundamental Rights or international protection obligations
Fundamental Rights or international protection obligations

records.context_note: A Frontex surveillance aircraft (Eagle 1) spotted an overcrowded wooden boat with 20+ migrants in the Maltese Search and Rescue (SAR) area. RCC Malta instructed a commercial vessel (Ross Sea) to contact the boat. An NGO vessel (Sea-Eye 4) later rescued 24 migrants, alleging they had been at sea for days without water/food and were hypothermic. The Fundamental Rights Office (FRO) noted the significant time elapsed between the initial alert to Italian MRCC and the rescue, and regretted the lack of detailed information from Maltese authorities regarding their assessment and actions.
